events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30, 2024, involving their car and another vehicle at a traffic intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident as it involves car damage sustained from a collision with another vehicle.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the case to ensure efficient processing and communication with the customer.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer was informed about the next steps and documentation required for further processing.
Request made for all relevant documents including police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and insurance policy details to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents on time including detailed photos of the damaged car and official police accident report.
Investigation commenced to verify claim details, assess damage severity, and determine liability based on submitted evidence and third-party reports.
Investigation concluded with a full assessment of damages and confirmation of fault being assigned to the other vehicle involved in the collision.
A settlement amount was calculated and proposed to the customer to cover repair costs and any associated expenses resulting from the accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and communicated their acceptance of the terms offered by the insurance company.
The claim was formally approved based on completed investigation and agreed settlement amount after customer acceptance was confirmed.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued and transferred to the customerâ€™s designated account for auto repair reimbursement.
The claim was officially closed having resolved all outstanding issues, compensation disbursed, and customer feedback recorded as positive.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim were securely archived following closure to comply with regulatory retention policies.
